actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The satarre makes two Claw or Spear attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: _Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

special_abilities.name: Void Strength
special_abilities.desc: The satarre is resistant to the blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and unconscious conditions.

special_abilities.name: Void Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The satarre's weapon attacks are magical. When the satarre hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 1d6 necrotic damage (included in the attack).
